original: MATTSSON, Nils Raoul Carlo Eiffel, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Dörby, Kalmar l, 1/10 89 av disp N M o Kristina Wahlgren, gm Signhild Säfström. Studex Kmr 08, ex KTH (V) 13, resoffex 15, kapt VVK 26. Bitr ing hos distr.ing kapt C J Insulander Sthlm 14, ing AB Förenade Sv Tändsticksfabr ny-byggn Kmr 15, bitr ing Väg- o vattenbyggn.-styr 15—16, ing AB Vattenbyggn.byrån Sthlm 16—19, ch tekn avd AB Sv Shell Sthlm sed. 19. Led kté i Rikskomm f ek försv.beredsk (oljecisternutsk) 35—36, k m:ts expert för oljelagringsutredn 37, led kté i Luftskydds-insp f utredn av skyddsåtg f oljeupplag. Studieres Engl, Holl, Frankr, Belg. RVO; Sv Tekn.frn, KAK, KSAK mfl.
translated: MATTSSON, Nils Raoul Carlo Eiffel, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, born in Dörby, Kalmar county, on October 1, 1889, to parents Nils Mattsson and Kristina Wahlgren. Married to Signhild Säfström. Studied in a military school in Karlskrona in 1908, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1913, became a reserve officer in 1915, and achieved the rank of Captain in the Swedish Army in 1926. Worked as an assistant engineer under Captain C.J. Insulander in Stockholm in 1914, then as an engineer for AB Förenade Svenska Tändsticksfabriken (United Swedish Match Factories) in 1915. From 1915 to 1916, he worked as an assistant engineer for the Road and Water Building Commission, and from 1916 to 1919, he worked as an engineer for AB Vattenbyggnadsbyrån (Swedish Water Building Bureau) in Stockholm. From 1919 onwards, he was the Chief Technician of the Technical Department at AB Svenska Shell in Stockholm. He was a member of the National Committee for Defense Preparedness (Oil Tank Committee) from 1935 to 1936, and served as an expert for the government's investigation on oil storage in 1937. He was also a member of the Air and Civil Defense Inspectorate Committee for investigating protective measures for oil storage. He studied in England, the Netherlands, France, and Belgium. Received the Order of Vasa, the Swedish Society of Engineers' Gold Medal, and was a member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences, among others.

occupation.name: Member of National Committee for Defense Preparedness
Expert for Government's Investigation on Oil Storage
Member of Air and Civil Defense Inspectorate Committee

awards.name: Swedish Society of Engineers' Gold Medal
